name: CatMafia
description:
CatMafia-a crime shooter with elements of slasher in the style of cartoon Noir will please the visual, pleasant controls and gameplay. As the game progresses, comics will introduce you to the story.

Feel your blood boil and your hands grow cold from the danger that is always there.
You are a cunning and wise cat, a debtor of the mafia with a difficult task-to steal a huge diamond "Cat's eye" from the dangerous island "Stone Fang".

Against you-packs of wolves, jackals and mice, which are many times stronger than you. But it is possible to cope with them. Earn points, buy new equipment and first aid kits to face the fattest enemy in the final battle.
